text.header1: Liens da yele Safely and Anonymously using Kasm Open-in-Isolation.
text.header2: Kasm Open in Isolation browser extension bɛ menu sugandicogo dɔ di min bɛ kininbolo digi walasa ka web links da wuli Workspaces isolated browser kɔnɔ. O b’a to a ka nɔgɔn ani a tɛ gɛlɛya ka URL siguilenw/lakanabaliw da wuli lafiya la walima k’i ka gundo mara. Ikomi ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔ bɛ jira yɔrɔjan baarakɛyɔrɔ navigatɔrɔ kɔnɔ, sanni a ka kɛ i ka sigida ɔridinatɛri kɔnɔ, i bɛ se ka jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔ ye lafiya la ani k’a sɔrɔ i tɔgɔ ma fɔ.
text.header3: Aw ye Kasm sɛbɛnw lajɛ walasa ka kunnafoni wɛrɛw sɔrɔ.
text.form2: Baara kɛ ni Cast Key ye

title.tooltip1: Go bɛna URL da wuli Baarakɛyɔrɔ kura kɔnɔ, Cast Key fɛɛrɛ ye baarakɛyɔrɔ bolilen dɔ ye min bɛ yen
title.tooltip2: Ni sɛbɛnni dabɔra Kasm Workspaces session kɔnɔ fo ni sɛrɛ ye URL ɲuman ye a bɛ tɛmɛ ɲininikɛla dɔ fɛ
title.tooltip3: Ni sɛbɛnni dabɔra Baarakɛyɔrɔ dɔ la i bɛ se ka sɛrɛkiliw falen minnu tɛmɛna Baarakɛyɔrɔ la (Find bɛ RegExp sariyalen dɛmɛ ni dancɛbɔlanw ye /regexp/g)
